reviewText: Up and coming director, filmmaker Corey Pierson is at it again.  Not sure when this man sleeps, but he's come out with Book of Job 1 and 2 and now this extremely relevant film "The Thin Black Line".  Its not your typical film on police brutality.  It shows whats really behind the killing of our Black children.  #POWER.  You don't be disappointed with your purchase.
